title: Les cartes, Plate 20 from "Les Toquades"
marks:
Title, inscription, stamp

LRQ, in the plate: [5 LLC, in pencil: [Les Cartes 2048 20]
description: two men seated at a table, playing a card game on a tray; man at L examines cards under his PL hand; man at R wears apron and cap and has a beard
creditline: Gift of funds from John E. Andrus III
